message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.NE 

The paper proposes a machine learning approach for automated segmentation of metastatic liver tumours from CT images. This involves learning similarity distributions and discriminant Grassmannian manifolds to distinguish between normal and pathological tissue. The approach also incorporates nonlocal pairwise and pattern-based clique potentials for global consistency in the segmentation process. Given the focus on image analysis and machine learning, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). Other likely sub-categories include cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.MM (Multimedia), and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
